product_name: The North Face Denali Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Denali Jacket keeps active kids warm and stylish for serious outfdoor play. Exceptionally warm, heavyweight Polartec(R) Classic 300 fleece contains at least 50% recycled content and is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant nylon overlays on elbows and upper body increase durability and water resistance. Features zippered, tricot-lined handwarmer pockets, non-binding nylon/Lycra(R) spandex cuffs and elastic-bound hem. The North Face Denali jacket has a collar that flips up for added neck protection and a write-on ID label to help prevent loss.
short_description: The North Face Denali Jacket keeps active kids warm and stylish for serious outfdoor play.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
